cast.overview: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.
cast.title: Godzilla Minus One

details.biography:
Miou Tanaka (田中 美央, Tanaka Miō, born July 4, 1974) is a Japanese actor and voice actor (seiyuu) born in Kita Ward, Kobe City, Hyogo Prefecture. He is affiliated with Empathy.

After graduating from Department of Performing Arts at Osaka University of Arts, he joined the theater company Haiyuza, where he stayed until February 2022. He is also the bassist for the irregularly active band Air Language. His vocal range is high baritone.
details.name: Miou Tanaka
